text: When a man hath taken a wife, and married her, and it come to pass that she find no favour in his eyes, because he hath found some uncleanness in her: then let him write her a bill of divorcement, and give it in her hand, and send her out of his house.24.1 someâ€¦: Heb. matter of nakedness24.1 divorcement: Heb. cutting off
